title: Update Uno Platform to v3.0
body:
**Description of Change**

 - Pull in the changes from Uno
 - Create a local branch so more things run
 - Add the new projects to all the solutions

**Bugs Fixed**

- Merging #1487

**API Changes**

<!-- REPLACE THIS COMMENT
List all API changes here (or just put None), example:

Added: 
 
- `string Class.Property { get; set; }`
- `void Class.Method();`

Changed:

 - `object Cell.OldPropertyName => object Cell.NewPropertyName`
 
-->

**Behavioral Changes**

<!-- Describe any non-bug related behavioral changes that may change how users app behaves when upgrading to this version of the codebase. -->

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation

comments.author: jeromelaban
comments.body: @mattleibow what's failing in the CI, can I help ?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
@jeromelaban ah, sorry about the delay. It is all good, just that CI can't build for iOS for a PR because it doesn't have access to the secrets.

I miss my public CI...

Anyway, I'll be merging soon. I just had to get out release signing working again. We have to make sure all the bits tick all the corporate boxes 😉 

Thanks for the PR, it all looks good.

comments.author: jeromelaban
comments.body:
For python, I changed it this way: https://github.com/unoplatform/docker/blob/394e55f5b3571466c2377e6ec50bb13a4f77bec8/wasm-build/Dockerfile#L7

It changes the default python to 3.x

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
Very interesting... I didn't know about that.

But, I need v2 for gn. So this seems to work for now.
